data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Missouri, United States to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Missouri, United States
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Missouri, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Missouri, United States.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, let those from the 1,621,473 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Missouri, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bosniak people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bosniak people.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Missouri. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Missouri to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Missouri that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Missouri
location.cities_list: Kansas City, St. Louis, Springfield, Columbia, Independence
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kansas City (475,378), St. Louis (315,685), Springfield (166,810), Columbia (119,108), Independence (117,255)
